tribepicker.underconstruction.descriptio:
We are still working
on inventing this tribe. Growing fruits, developing languages and
architecture. That takes time you know. Follow @Midjiwan on
Instagram or Twitter and you will be the first to know when new
tribes arrive!
tribepicker.freetribe.description:
This tribe is available for
free and cannot be purchased to enable online multiplayer.
